Posts.Content: Jul 12, 2015 10:26AM Skpsherry wrote: I just saw your reply (haven't visited this site much). My scans in May showed some progress so I am now off GDC and have just begun a new trial of a targeted therapy IMMU-132,an antigen conjugate. We'll see how this goes. Just had my first infusion last week and so far and feeling good. Good luck with your treatment.
Posts.Title: Trial drug GDC-0810 (ARN-810) LilSchatzie babs6287

Posts.Content: May 15, 2015 06:50AM Skpsherry wrote: Hi! I am in my second month on this trial drug. At MGH having scans right now so we'll know soon if the drug has had any effect. I'm on 600mg...I assume you're the same. Feeling very good except some flare ups of bone pain, mainly in my back and some leg cramping.
